message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 12-2-1, translated into en
data:
Currently, only a few years are available: 2011; 2015; 2016 and 2018

There are no published data by subgroup Provinces/Cities directly under the Central Government

(Published source: 2020 national report on 5-year progress towards implementation of sustainable development goals. Data from the Ministry of Natural Resources and Environment)
